results.name: Sippin Hot Blickety Block N Bop Those Bad Battle Boys Down To Size Supreme

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (Windows RT and 10 Mobile are not supported)
  • Processor: Intel Core i Processor Series (Low Voltage Processor is not supported)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 620
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card that supports DirectSound
  • Additional Notes: A pointing device required
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i Processor Series (Low Voltage Processor is not supported)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 1030
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card that supports DirectSound
  • Additional Notes: A pointing device required

  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 equivalent or greater
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3072 MB available space

  • Storage: 3072 MB available space
